channel.title: Un named project
channel.description:
Welcome to my un named project.
I will be using Devolution-x (the version before final devolution) the reason for this is i wanted a clean server , final devolution laggs after 40+ players so this i will be using.
the client i will be using is galokons refactored , i [u]WONT[/u] be adding any customs , its a old school server which i will be adding skills , perfect pvp /pvnpc including magic , melee , ranged.
i have recently added friends/ignore list to it which was a complete fuck about but finally got it working.
there is no pictures yet since i have just started but there will be later on today or tommorow.
I need some ideas for my server (minigames , area for skills etc.) i was thinking of a very realisitc server with no real skill area but trees and rocks everywhere but i dont like the idea very well.
i hope to see people supporting me and helping me get my server up and going :)

item.dc:creator: @_jeba `jeba
item.description:
@_jeba wrote:

ahh cool.

item.title: Un named project
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

[quote="`jeba, post:20, topic:307069"][quote author=I Yaa I link=topic=403218.msg2989066#msg2989066 date=1255195385]

Yes, but also old-school to a point.

In my eyes, old-school is before Jagex REALLY fucked RuneScape up.

At the time of the Godsword release, Bandos hit higher than Armadyl and used more spec, though that changed with the death of wildy as they got desperate for players.

I wouldn’t exactly disagree with torso’s and D boots as some items actually made the game better.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 10, 2009, 11:07:41 am[/size][hr][quote author=Lewis) link=topic=403218.msg2987475#msg2987475 date=1255100429]
i`m going to try so dont come to this thread to put me down.

At least you’re trying, fuck the flamers
[/quote]

When i think of ‘oldschool’ i think of using a 317 client that loads 317 cache, no customs at all, just 317… That’s that best pk you can get… There wouldnt be whip and ags… Because whip and dds is the best
[/quote]

I hate godswords myself, though they aren’t that bad. There comes a point where 377 MUST step in.

My idea is to set up a Barbarian assault based off what minigames I can create, therefore giving 377 more use.
Also… Monkfish were a good addition to RuneScape as they help a fair bit, When my servers done it’ll be the best F2P food which, really beats swordies.

Out of interest, when did you start RuneScape anyway? I was around the 280 mark i think, Just before farming came out.[/quote]

I was around 280 also, with the old falador etc

Read full topic

@_jeba wrote:

[quote=“I Yaa I, post:19, topic:307069”][quote author=`jeba link=topic=403218.msg2989040#msg2989040 date=1255194413]
Yes, but also old-school to a point.

In my eyes, old-school is before Jagex REALLY fucked RuneScape up.

At the time of the Godsword release, Bandos hit higher than Armadyl and used more spec, though that changed with the death of wildy as they got desperate for players.

I wouldn’t exactly disagree with torso’s and D boots as some items actually made the game better.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 10, 2009, 11:07:41 am[/size][hr][quote author=Lewis) link=topic=403218.msg2987475#msg2987475 date=1255100429]

When i think of ‘oldschool’ i think of using a 317 client that loads 317 cache, no customs at all, just 317… That’s that best pk you can get… There wouldnt be whip and ags… Because whip and dds is the best[/quote]

I hate godswords myself, though they aren’t that bad. There comes a point where 377 MUST step in.

My idea is to set up a Barbarian assault based off what minigames I can create, therefore giving 377 more use.
Also… Monkfish were a good addition to RuneScape as they help a fair bit, When my servers done it’ll be the best F2P food which, really beats swordies.

Out of interest, when did you start RuneScape anyway? I was around the 280 mark i think, Just before farming came out.

I dislike claws/re coloured item , i like the idea of godswords.

Sabia:

I can see this is going to fail. This guy dosen’t even know what his talking about.

i`m going to try so dont come to this thread to put me down.

iMac_:

I’ll upload a 377-390 client that works if you want me to, it needs some work.

It would be very helpfull , thank-you :).

item.title: Un named project
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

[quote="`jeba, post:9, topic:307069"][quote author=I Yaa I link=topic=403218.msg2986920#msg2986920 date=1255042840]

I can see this is going to fail. This guy dosen’t even know what his talking about.

Oldschool servers arent a fail, im in the progress of one using emulous. When i get deeper into the project i’m going to make a thread. But this isn’t a complete fail. I’m pretty sure you don’t know whats he’s talking about.
[/quote]

Emulous is quite a good base. Problem is Impact already conquers it, so you have to keep up :P.

So you’re making an ‘old school’ server huh?

Who isn’t making an oldschool server these days? nobody likes the new crap :)[/quote]

Haha i agree, oldschool servers are better then the delta crap

Read full topic
